short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play 18 exciting Solitaire Card Games including Klondike, Spider and FreeCell.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Soothe your solitaire craving with this collection of 18 games. A quality free App in which you'll find the best and most known solitaire card games: FreeCell, Klondike, Klondike (deal 3), Forty Thieves, Golf, Pyramid, Spider (three levels: Easy, Medium and Difficult) and more!

Solitaire Collection 18 Games features:
- 100% Free
- No download or registration required
- Smooth fluid and advanced animations
- Many beautiful card sets, card backs and backgrounds to choose from
- Automatic card flipping
- Deal animation and winning animation
- Double click to auto move cards
- Unlimited undo and redo options
- Statistics tracking
- Hint function will suggest a move if you need help
- Save game progress
- and much more...
